title: transfer
body: i accidetly go to turkey with 1 rp from my other account wat can i do to go back to eune I also press cancel but they transerf me

replies.body: Since there are so many confirmation steps for account transfers, I'm not entirely sure what can be done in this case. Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if that could get reversed.
